title: Non ho la scrollbar su TicketSms
content:
Ciao, su Firefox non appare la scrollbar su https://www.ticketsms.it/ mentre su Chrome appare. Ho provato la modalità "risoluzione problemi" senza successo. Volevo sapere se è un problema solo mio o del sito, se è un bug da segnalare etc.

Grazie
creator: cippo1995

title: survey-smiles.com riskwear help?
content: Hi, my anti-virus keep blocking a redirect to a riskwear website called survey-smiles.com over and over again. This has been happening for a few days now and I'd really like it to stop. I cleared the cookies and site data thinking that might help but it didnt. What else can I do?
creator: erinska_1997

title: Mistake coping a digital certificate
content: When I try to make a copy of a digital certificate from FNMT-RCM (Casa de la moneda y timbre de España) always appear the same error. (Add it in image) I´ve tried desinstalling the authoritie certificate, installing it again...but always have the same mistake.
creator: h.rodriguez

title: yahoo mail with Firefox not showing all emails flashing not loading and showing up as only gray bars
content: Lately my Yahoo mail has been not working properly with Firefox, it only shows a few emails and then the list starts to flash when I am loading and scrolling down the emails. About 75 will load then the rest of the emails show up as gray bars then nothing.This just started happening in the last month or so. I have been yahoo mail with Firefox for years with no problems. I don't know what changed? I updated my Firefox to the latest and it still is doing this. I think it must have started during my last update. Can anyone please help! Thank you
creator: pixiegurrl

title: Resize Card Reader Image
content: Please can you advice which way to resize the image of my bank card reader. Each time I open my account on line, the image of the card reader is so long (it seems in a landscape mode) that there is no more space for me to input security details. Is it possible for the image to be resized ie from landscape to portrait. I tried using Ctrl plus and Ctrl minus but it is a bit tricky. Thanks for your help.
creator: aida.prouse

title: I forgot 2nd authentication and recovery key
content:
Hi, I have trouble in login. I set 2nd authentication with wrong app, and I didn't backup my recovery key. I also formatted my desktop, so I cannot find recovery key, didn't set firefox sync, and all of my device wasn't connect with my ID.

In this case, how I can recovery my ID...?

And if I cannot recovery my ID, can I delete addon that already being distributed.
creator: yjhoon3658

title: authy invalid code when trying to set up 2 step authentification
content: I tried scanning the QR code or inputting the code manually, in both cases authy always generates an invalid code.
creator: ftarabout

title: Downloads intermittent on Chessgames.com but only with Firefox
content: Basically same as archived thread "download" (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1328091). I've tried all the suggestions; none worked. Might have same problem in Safari, but never with Chrome. Also, only started with Firefox 2 days ago. Refreshing page sometimes helps, usually doesn't. It's like trying to start a fire with a flint spark. It either "goes" or it doesn't. Very weird. Btw, when it goes, link turns purple. When it fails, link stays blue.
creator: czxcz2

title: Firefox browser hangs for about a minute when text is copied.
content:
Firefox for Windows hangs when I copy text, either by Ctrl+X, Ctrl+C or by using a right-click menu. The browser just stops responding. It doesn't crash. Eventually, it will return and behave normally.

I tried removing all extensions and closing all open tabs. No change. I'm out of ideas. I suspect it may be trying to synchronize with something it can't find or there's network latency. Task Manager shows it's using a lot of resources. It doesn't do it every time, just often enough to be frustrating.

Windows Specifications: Edition Windows 11 Pro Version 22H2 Installed on ‎5/‎14/‎2022 OS build 22622.598 Experience Windows Feature Experience Pack 1000.22634.1000.0
creator: karla10
